data.name: Shillelagh Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Described as "punishing", the Shillelagh soundtrack is a love letter to many of our most treasured doom, stoner, and sludge metal bands of the past few decades, including Sleep, Electric Wizard, Green Druid, Candlemass, Melvins, Black Sabbath, and Thou.
data.about_the_game: Described as "punishing", the Shillelagh soundtrack is a love letter to many of our most treasured doom, stoner, and sludge metal bands of the past few decades, including Sleep, Electric Wizard, Green Druid, Candlemass, Melvins, Black Sabbath, and Thou.
